nodes.text: Low'n was a populous world in the Romintine sector of the Mid Rim. It was the homeworld of the Lowen.

The Lowen saboteur Ostan Atur was born on Low'n, where she grew up surrounded by mercenaries and smugglers. Deciding to become a saboteur, she learned a great deal about technology by frequenting Low'n spaceports and tech shops.
